vsParam:
Escha? What's the matter? Why are you staring at
the window? Is there anything particular... Ah, apple trees!

Escha, Escha.
Would you like some apples?

Ah, no.
Just a memory of my family.

Escha's family?
Is it related to apples?
Yes. My parents are apple growers.

The harvests are very poor in recent years.
But our apples are very delicious...

When I saw that tree, I couldn't help but wonder how's our harvest
this year. I really want to go back and help pick apples...

... Apples in your world
must be very delicious.
Yes! They are as sweet as honey!

It is very good no matter you eat it directly, or use it for
desserts or for dishes!

Ah, haha, look how excited you are...
You do love apples.
You can have as many apples as you want here!
Apples in Olbius are delicious too, huh?

Hehe. Indeed, Albus' apples
are quite yummy too!

Yes, very delicious!
And they look pretty...

But... Apples from Colseit
are just as good!

Er, really that delicious?
I want to taste Colseit's apples already... (swallowing)

Yeah! I really want you to try the apples from Colseit
when it's possible...

But, I must find a way to go back
to the world I come from first...

Ha-ha, don't worry too much.
I'm sure you'll find it!

If you find a way to go back to your world,
let's see which world's apples are more delicious!

Good idea!
I can't wait to try Colseit's apples!

When that time comes, I'll treat you to
the apple tarts we take pride in!

Great! Let's cheer up and help Escha to find a way
to go back to her world, [px]!
